parameters.command:
=# Fetch Hacker News security posts
echo "Fetching HN security posts..."

# Get newest stories
curl -s 'https://hacker-news.firebaseio.com/v0/newstories.json' | \
  jq -r '.[:100][]' | \
  head -50 | \
  while read id; do
    story=$(curl -s "https://hacker-news.firebaseio.com/v0/item/${id}.json")
    title=$(echo "$story" | jq -r '.title // empty' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')
    
    # Filter for security keywords
    if echo "$title" | grep -iE '(security|vulnerability|breach|exploit|cve|hack|malware|ransomware|0day|zero.day)' > /dev/null; then
      echo "$story"
    fi
  done | jq -s '.'

=# Save HTML report and convert to PDF
timestamp="{{ $json.timestamp }}"
filename="{{ $json.filename }}"

html_file="/tmp/${filename}"
pdf_file="/tmp/security_news_${timestamp}.pdf"

echo "Saving report..."

# Save HTML
cat > "$html_file" << 'HTMLEOF'
{{ $json.html }}
HTMLEOF

echo "‚úì HTML saved: $html_file"

# Convert to PDF if html2pdf is available
if command -v html2pdf &> /dev/null; then
  html2pdf "$html_file" "$pdf_file" 2>/dev/null || echo "PDF conversion skipped"
  if [ -f "$pdf_file" ]; then
    echo "‚úì PDF saved: $pdf_file"
  fi
fi

echo "{\"htmlPath\":\"$html_file\",\"pdfPath\":\"$pdf_file\",\"filename\":\"$filename\",\"timestamp\":\"$timestamp\"}"

assignments.name: message
assignments.value: =Security news digest complete! Found {{ $('Aggregate & Rank').first().json.totalItems }} items. Report saved to: {{ JSON.parse($json.stdout).htmlPath }}

parameters.command:
=# Search for telecom breaches and infrastructure attacks
echo "Searching for telecom/infrastructure attacks..."

# Search multiple sources
results='[]'

# Google News search via web scraping
curl -s "https://news.google.com/rss/search?q=telecom+breach+OR+telecommunications+hack+OR+infrastructure+attack+when:1d" 2>/dev/null | \
  grep -E '<item>|<title>|<link>|<pubDate>' | \
  sed 's/<[^>]*>//g' | \
  paste -d'|' - - - | \
  head -10 > /tmp/telecom_news.txt || touch /tmp/telecom_news.txt

# Also search for AI-powered attacks
curl -s "https://news.google.com/rss/search?q=AI+attack+infrastructure+OR+AI+powered+hack+OR+machine+learning+attack+when:1d" 2>/dev/null | \
  grep -E '<item>|<title>|<link>|<pubDate>' | \
  sed 's/<[^>]*>//g' | \
  paste -d'|' - - - | \
  head -10 >> /tmp/telecom_news.txt || true

if [ -s /tmp/telecom_news.txt ]; then
  cat /tmp/telecom_news.txt
else
  echo "No recent telecom/infrastructure attacks found"
fi

nodes.name: Telecom Breach Search
nodes.notes: Search for telecom breaches and AI-powered infrastructure attacks

nodes.name: Prepare Email
nodes.notes: Prepare email with summary and full HTML report
